item.description: I’m coco (aka k0rventen), 25 yo IT engineer. Hot topics for me right now are kubernetes, devops & software supply chain. As I don’t have a very good memory, I needed a place to put various projects and works that i’ve already done inside them, so that i won’t have to reinvent the wheel each time a similar situation arise. But it’s also a way of sharing my ideas, solutions etc so that maybe one day it might help someone.
